product_name: Sanuk Yoga Joy Metallic Flip-Flops - Women's
long_description: Made from yoga mats, the women's Sanuk Yoga Joy Metallic Flip-Flops will let your feet breathe deeply on warm summer days. Metallic synthetic straps have a soft jersey lining for comfort next to skin. Added arch support improves comfort. Happy U sponge rubber outsoles. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: Made from yoga mats, the women's Sanuk Yoga Joy Metallic Flip-Flops will let your feet breathe deeply on warm summer days.
